mapper.insert: insert into membertable(memNum, memName, memEmail, memNickname, memPw, memAd, memAddetail, memGender, memPh) values(#{memNum}, #{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{memNickname} , #{memPw}, #{memAd}, #{memAddetail}, #{memGender}, #{memPh})
mapper.update: update membertable set memName = #{memName}, memNickname = #{memNickname}, memAd = #{memAd}, memAddetail = #{memAddetail}, memGender = #{memGender}, memPh = #{memPh} where memNum = #{memNum}
mapper.select: SELECT mt.memNum, memName, memNickname, memPw, memAd, memGender, memPh, memAuth, memEmail, memAddetail FROM membertable mt LEFT OUTER JOIN auth_table Auth on mt.memNum = Auth.memNum WHERE mt.memNum = #{memNum}

SELECT mt.memNum, memName, memNickname, memPw, memAd, memGender, memPh, memAuth, memEmail, memAddetail FROM membertable mt LEFT OUTER JOIN auth_table Auth on mt.memNum = Auth.memNum WHERE mt.memEmail = #{memEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into Member_PROFILE(File_no, memNum, ChangeName) Values(Profile_seq.nextval, #{memNum}, #{ChangeName})
mapper.select: select p.ChangeName FROM membertable m LEFT OUTER JOIN Member_PROFILE p on m.memNum = p.memNum where p.memNum = #{memNum}
mapper.update: update Member_PROFILE set ChangeName = #{ChangeName} Where memNum = #{memNum}
